comment.author: 14298115@N02
comment._content: it wasn't "red" china at the time

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/14298115@N02] I searched the photo in question. Unfortunately there is no date on the back of the photo but the inscription says "Ann Sheridan on Red China Tour." It very well could be after WWII that she is visiting China, or even if it was during WWII she could be in territory held by the Communist Chinese under Mao. Just a thought.
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
